short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the youtube homepage more calm by graying out unviewed video thumbnails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides thumbnails to reduce visual clutter when browsing the YouTube homepage.

If you want to view a thumbnail, just hover over its title area
